name: Workshop Master
description: Skilled craftsman who commissions equipment and offers workshop contracts.
personality: Practical and detail-oriented, values quality work and proper tools.

name: Market Trader
description: Experienced merchant who buys and sells trade goods, offers delivery contracts.
personality: Business-focused and opportunistic, always looking for profitable deals.

name: Tavern Keeper
description: Friendly innkeeper who offers room rentals and simple labor contracts.
personality: Hospitable and well-informed, knows local gossip and travel conditions.

name: Logger
description: Rugged woodsman who offers logging contracts and sells lumber and grain.
personality: Straightforward and hardworking, respects those who can handle physical labor.

name: Herb Gatherer
description: Knowledgeable herbalist who sells herbs and offers gathering contracts.
personality: Quiet and observant, deeply connected to the forest and its resources.

name: Camp Boss
description: Tough foreman who offers heavy labor contracts and equipment repair.
personality: Demanding but fair, values workers who can handle difficult conditions.

name: Dock Master
description: Experienced harbor master who sells fish and offers dock work contracts.
personality: Weathered and reliable, knows the river systems and boat schedules.

name: Trade Captain
description: Traveling merchant captain who offers transport contracts and bulk trade deals.
personality: Adventurous and well-traveled, always seeking new opportunities and routes.

name: River Worker
description: Hardworking laborer who offers simple contracts and boat maintenance work.
personality: Steady and dependable, takes pride in honest work and fair dealing.

name: Elena
description: A friendly merchant who often needs letters delivered. She values personal connections and trust.
personality: Warm and trusting, values personal connections and remembers kindnesses.

name: Marcus
description: A shrewd trader who deals in valuable goods and commercial correspondence.
personality: Business-focused and practical, always looking for reliable couriers.

name: Lord Ashford
description: A minor noble who maintains correspondence with other aristocrats.
personality: Formal and proper, expects discretion and promptness in deliveries.
